body: Frequently as brutal but not as bloody as battles to the death, a knockout bout does not end in the death of one side, but still requires a clear and crushing victory. As long as both sides in the performance combat remain standing, the fight continues. Many knockout bout combats require that their participants deal nonlethal damage.
name: Knockout Bout
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Performance Combat/Types of Performance Combat/Knockout Bout
